Sinesis, being prehistoric himself, heard Magmatron's call. Sinister, being
a prehistoric giant scorpion, also heard.

"Why is he calling all dinosaurs? Does this mean we're dinosaurs? Sinesis
asked.

"I guess so, let's go make ourselves THREATS to this guy, who himself is
probably a THREAT!" Sinesis said, laughing uncontrollably. Sinesis and
Sinister homed in on Magmatron and his near his position...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Dachande85@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2000 4:24 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


>     Magmatron's ship headed toward past Earth. His plans were coming to
> frutation. He could see the planet that Megatron, Hell Beast, Liono
> (spelling?) Prime, and all the others that were fighting for Cybertron.
>     "I wonder how my good friend Bazooka is?" He muttered to himself.
> "Oh..Can't forget Bobertron."
>     Magmatron has no beast mode yet.
>     "Warning, Ionic interfearence. Unable to navigate safe landing.
Emergency
> Stasis Lock under effect."
>     Magmatron went into stasis lock. The Ship crashed into the planet
> causeing a land slide. His ship was buried but Skeletons were uncovered.
The
> DNA Scanner came online and began to scan, it malfunctioned because of the
> Ionic interfearence and made a Fuzor mode.
>     He awoke and began his plan. Calling out to all the Dinosaurs he could
> reach. But projecting his signal from another location entirely.
>     "Bazooka, Bobertron, Carnage, Dark One, Skywarp, Ramjet, Dirge,
> Terrorsaur, Cyber Claw, Ultracon, Stegotron, Triceradon, Sludge, Swoop,
> Snarl, Slag, Grimlock, Dinobot, Iron Raptor, join me in my quest. I will
> reward you greatly. I will not ask you to destroy your leaders. Simply to
> join me in my quest. Cybertron will be ours." Magmatron Signaled to the
> Dinosaur Transformers. He awaited the reply.
>
